General.Name: Ever Shine Textile Industry
General.Description: PT Ever Shine Tex Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of yarns and fabric products in Indonesia. It offers nylon and polyester yarn products for elastic, brocade, socks, ribbon, shoelace, and sewing thread; woven products for bed sheet, blouse, jacket, pillow case, shirt, and suits; and wrap knit products for shoes, helmet, sweater, and mosquito net. The company provides its products under the PRD, APL 10000, APOLLO, HUT 1080, DECOTEX, LININGTEX, and PROCOTTON brand names. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Ever Shine Tex Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Cahaya Interkontinental.
General.Address: Jalan H. Fachruddin No. 16, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10250
